name: Hanging Out Together, Eriri
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: We're not close at all. We quarrel every day, which is the only thing that hasn't changed.

name: Hanging Out Together, Izumi
ability: 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if you have a card in your memory, this card gets +1 level and +2500 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Dream-Spun Sketch" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 "Little Love Rhapsody" or 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, if the character chosen is level 3 or higher, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Gosh. Although Tomoya-senpai is still a moe buta like before, the scripts he's been writing are great!

name: World's Happiest Illustrator, Eriri
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Did You Like Me 10 Years Ago?" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Game》 character, you may choose 1 "World's Happiest Illustrator, Eriri" or "Dressed Up, Utaha" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, you may put all of the cards in your hand and in your stock into your waiting room. If you put 5 or more cards into your waiting room, choose 1 "World's Happiest Illustrator, Eriri" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Game》 character, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Dressed Up, Eriri
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Er? What did you say?

name: Sincere Emotions, Eriri
ability: 【CONT】 If you would pay the 【ACT】 cost for your "Unwavering Feelings, Utaha", you may put 1 marker from underneath this card into your waiting room instead of 1 card from your stock.

【AUTO】 When your other character in the middle position of the center stage with "Eriri(英梨々)" or "Utaha(詩羽)" in its card name becomes 【REVERSE】, if you have 2 or less markers underneath this card, put the top card of your deck face up underneath this card as a marker.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: After all, it was such a long ill-fated relationship.

name: Gathered Again, Eriri
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Never-Changing" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 event or character from among them, puts it into your hand, you choose up to 1 card except the card put into your hand among the revealed cards, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Do explain to me. What do you mean by this?

name: Earnest Emotions, Izumi
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose up to 2 《Game》 characters in your waiting room, and put them at the bottom of your clock in any order. At the end of the turn, put X cards from the bottom of your clock into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of cards put into your clock by this effect.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, for every 2 cards in your clock, perform the following action. "Choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn."
flavor_text: I see!

name: Heartfelt Words, Eriri
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If you have 2 or more 《Game》 characters in your memory, this card gets +4000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Of course it's because you look mischievous and calculating. But actually you're very reliable and kind.

name: Unfading Youth Graffiti, Izumi
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, at the end of the turn, put up to 2 cards from the bottom of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Dream-Spun Sketch" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Game》 characters, perform the following action. "If you have 5 or less cards in your clock, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. If you have 6 cards in your clock, you may deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Even if the script is of limited proficiency, as long as there is Michiru-senpai's BGM and Megumi-san's performance, as well as my drawing skill, the game experience can't be so bad!

name: Last Spurt, Izumi
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Move of a Mother-in-Law, Eriri
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavor_text: OK, you have scraped through.

name: Unfading Youth Graffiti, Tomoya
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, put this card into your memory.

【AUTO】 Memory [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this face up card face down] If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Are you really complimenting me on my script?

name: Unfading Youth Graffiti, Iori
ability: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [Put 1《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Usually I don't do the things that everyone can do.

name: Unfading Youth Graffiti, Eriri
ability: 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if you have a card in your memory, this card gets +1500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card or this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, that character cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (The "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule cannot be used either)

ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: You're talking so big, Izumi Hashima.

name: Gathered Again, Izumi
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +4000 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if you have another "Gathered Again, Tomoya", you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.

【ACT】 [(1)] Put this card at the bottom of your stock. Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: A Maiden's Sharp Instinct, Izumi
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text:
Michiru: "Ah, now we needn't worry anymore."
Izumi: "…Sighs."

name: Working on Edits, Izumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Game》 characters you have ×500.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: The Only One Panicking, Izumi
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Heat Up, Akane
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Game》 character is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】, and that character gets +3000 power until the end of the next turn.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Together Someday, Eriri
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Qualities of a Maiden, Eriri" [Put 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Qualities of a Maiden, Eriri" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Gathered Again, Iori
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room."

ability: If you do not have a 《Game》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it.
"Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
"If you have 6 cards in your clock, search your deck for up to 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck."
You cannot play "Desperate Overnight Work" from your hand until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.

name: Hanging Out Together, Megumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room. If you have 4 or more other 《Game》 characters, you may put that card into your stock instead of into your waiting room.

If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent. Put all level 1 or higher cards revealed by this damage into your opponent's clock in the revealed order, even if this damage is canceled. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1."

name: Watching a Live Concert, Utaha
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase.

name: Great Helper, Utaha
ability: 【AUTO】 Memory When you use this card's "Backup", if you have 3 or more 《Game》 characters in your memory, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock."

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Seems it's time for us to go on stage.

name: Rubbishly Cute Storyline
ability: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 characters with "Megumi(恵)" in its card name, and 【REST】 it. If you do, perform the following effects 1 time in any order.

"Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character with "Megumi(恵)" in its card name from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
"Choose 1 character with "Megumi(恵)" in its card name in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
"Choose 1 of your characters with "Megumi(恵)" in its card name, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn."
flavor_text: Akane: "Was the rubbishly cute storyline 'cherry blessing' written by you?"

name: Happy Birthday MEGUMI
ability: Your opponent puts the top 24 cards of their deck into their waiting room.
flavor_text:
Michiru: "Happy birthday, Kato!"
Izumi: "Happy birthday, Megumi-san, though it's one day late."

name: A Main Heroine For You Only
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: What do you think? Have I become your dream heroine? It's not only for the gamers. I want to be…

name: He Will Continue to Chase After Us From Now On
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Utaha: "For he is a fan who admires a great writer as well as a competitor who desired to go beyond that writer."

name: Because We're Best Friends
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Best Incident
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: After all we worked overtime more than twice as long as usual during the final period.

name: Gym Time, Megumi
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if you do not have a red card in your memory, you may put this card into your memory.

【AUTO】 Memory [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your main phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal up to 1 climax in your hand, choose 1 different colored climax from the revealed card in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavor_text: Don't you think that if you want to ask for the help of others, you should have the appropriate attitude?

name: Path You Chose To Walk, Megumi
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each other 《Game》 character in your back stage.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "It Was Exactly What I Wanted" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Game》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If the character chosen is level 3 or higher, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: You didn't make a mistake. We just didn't cooperate well in terms of time. There was nothing wrong except that.

name: World's Happiest Author, Utaha
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "He's Definitely Fallen For Us..." is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Hanging Out Together, Utaha
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Game》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Game》, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] ".
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: We haven't seen each other for so long. Come over here, let's catch up.

name: Unfading Youth Graffiti, Utaha
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.

【AUTO】 Memory When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more cards in your memory, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Now we've got to start to prepare the new proposal.

name: Unwavering Feelings, Utaha
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +1000 power.
【ACT】 [(4) 【REST】 this card] Choose up to 1 "World's Happiest Illustrator, Eriri" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Racing Heartbeat Overlap, Megumi
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Closing The Distance Between Us" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 5 cards from among them, put them into their waiting room, return the rest to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck.

name: Dressed Up, Megumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of their deck. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Dressed Up, Utaha
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "World's Happiest Illustrator, Eriri", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Gathered Again, Utaha

【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Gathered Again, Utaha" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if "How To Raise A Boring Girlfriend –Finale–" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: What do you think? This is the top masterpiece of Utako Kasumi. The latest work of Blessing Software. The outline of "How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend: Finale".
